text:
State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 3) 2004

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 11 of the State Service Act 2000 .

21 June 2004

RICHARD BUTLER

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 3) 2004 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2004.

3. Amalgamation of Adult Education with Department of Education
    Adult Education, part of TAFE Tasmania, is amalgamated with the Department of Education.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 June 2004

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
